text: Allatu (ivarkaḷuṭaiya utāraṇam:) Aṭarnta iruḷum, iṭiyum, miṉṉalum koṇṭa mēkam poḻiyum maḻaiyil akappaṭṭuk koṇṭa(varkaḷiṉ utāraṇattai ottirukkiṟatu. Ivvāṟu akappaṭṭuk koṇṭa i)varkaḷ iṭi muḻakkaṅkaḷāl maraṇattiṟkup payantu taṅkaḷ viralkaḷait taṅkaḷ kātukaḷil nuḻaittu (aṭaittu)k koḷkiṉṟaṉar. Nirākarikkum ivarkaḷai allāh (eppoḻutum) cūḻntirukkiṟāṉ
